item.title: Video Production & Editing for Web & Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
AMPLYFI is an AI-Powered Market Intelligence Platform. We are seeking a video producer to support with the creation of videos for our Marketing and Sales teams, specifically:

- Editing Content
- Cleaning/grading Audio/visuals
- Adding motion graphics & stings
- Adding transcripts and subtitles
- Exporting & uploading to appropriate platforms

Successful partners can work autonomously to produce professional content that matches our brand, paying close attention to detail and having a clear idea of what makes video content interesting to watch.

Initially seeking a partner for short-term work, we are open to longer-term engagements.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:51 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Marketing Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Marketing Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.
We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!

If you can accept our rules, please tell me the product you can do and your address, I will set up the order sheet for you，and establish the contract


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:29 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics for 30 Sec Video - Upwork
item.description:
I need a Motion Graphic Editor who can help me work on this project together. I've designed and made the storyboard ready, with the script, and have started on designing the frames.

I need someone who can work closely with a designer, and be able to share their expertise on the matter. We want to work with a creative person who can suggest improvements if needed and be able to animate a dynamic scene.

The video is going to be 30 sec. Related to cybersecurity. With abstract shapes and story.

Here is a reference link https://www.instagram.com/reel/Ckdyf9VjUUr/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

It's not going to be very dynamic like this but something close.

Please share 3 links to your best work to be considered.

Thanks



Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:26 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Video Intro & Outro, Sound Design, Video Production, Animation
Skills: Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Video Intro & Outro, Sound Design, Video Production, Animation
Country: Albania

item.title: A.I. video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
AI Video Specialist Needed to Create 100 Videos Using InVideo.ai**

**Description:**

I am seeking a talented AI Video Specialist to create 100 high-quality videos using InVideo.ai for my YouTube channel. I have 100 scripts ready, each with three subject matters per video. The ideal candidate will have experience with InVideo.ai and a strong background in video creation and editing.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create 100 videos using InVideo.ai based on provided scripts.
- Ensure each video aligns with the given script and subject matters.
- Customize templates and apply transitions, animations, and effects to enhance video quality.
- Incorporate stock photos, videos, and music from the InVideo.ai library as needed.
- Ensure all videos meet YouTube's quality and format requirements.
- Deliver the final videos in a timely manner according to the agreed schedule.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience with InVideo.ai or similar video creation platforms.
- Strong video editing skills and a good eye for design and detail.
- Ability to follow scripts and accurately represent the content.
- Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.
- Good communication skills to provide regular updates on progress.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Previous experience creating videos for YouTube channels.
- Portfolio showcasing previous work done with InVideo.ai.

**Additional Information:**
- The scripts for the videos and detailed instructions will be provided.
- This is a one-time project with the potential for future collaboration based on performance.

**How to Apply:**
- Submit your resume and a brief cover letter explaining your experience with InVideo.ai.
- Provide links to your portfolio or samples of previous video work.
- Include your proposed timeline for completing the 100 videos.

We look forward to seeing your application and discussing how you can help bring our video content to life!



Hourly Range: $5.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:22 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing with Map Animations Needed for YouTube Videos - GEOlayers 3 - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who has experience making high-quality map animations using GEOlayers 3 or similar. To see an example of the type of editing we are looking for check the link below.

Examples: (not my channel)
https://youtu.be/l86HII1Cx2I?si=E6lx7CqiAmhmJJQn

We need someone who is fast but can also maintain high quality. We plan on starting out slow with just a few videos and then will eventually increase to daily videos.

If you can create similar map animations like the example above then I would love to work together!

Budget: $200

item.title: Looking for 2d Stick Figure Animator - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced animator to join my production team on a growing youtube channel.

Duties:
You’ll be given a voice-over audio file and a script with detailed animator instructions. Your job will be to create stick figure drawings, scenes, and animations to produce an engaging and fun-to-watch video.

Requirements to Apply:

- Adobe Animate, Premiere Pro
- Good English communication skills
- Artistic ability to copy a specific style of illustration
- Ability to draw quickly for a quick turnaround
- Attention to detail
- Good communication
- Be willing to ask questions to clarify instructions if you don’t understand
- Turn in work on time

The videos will need to be in a similar style as below.:

https://youtube.com/@serioushistory
https://www.youtube.com/@ChatHistory
https://www.youtube.com/@TrustMeBroOfficial

Application Process:
- Submit your application with examples of work.
- A sample will be required in the next step.

Start your application with “Stickman” to ensure that you have read the job post fully. We will share further requirements in the next stage.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 28, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Adobe Animate, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: India
click to apply
